reviews.review: 这条好评完全是为了伊丽莎白。
如果是win10系统在游戏中出现闪退可以把自带输入法添加其他国家的语言的输入法，在进游戏的之前换成其他国家的输入法就可以了

un shooter con todo lo que tiene que tener... por momentos grandes desafíos y una dificultad muy elevada... lo que lo hace excelente. Distinto a las otras 2 entregas, que era mas sombrias. Pero sigue teniendo la impronta de los creadores.

展示通关了本体，经过了巫师3和生化奇兵之后，发现自己变成女儿控了，在开局哈利路亚的时候被天空之城的美丽所震撼，为伊丽莎白的遭遇感到悲惨，对布克的卖女行为不齿，又对他敢于面对错误就回女儿并为此牺牲自己而敬重。
  再说说我个人认为的一些不合理（不懂）的地方，既然都是平行空间，那每个空间应该是互不干扰的才对啊，假设布克所在的空间是主宇宙，康姆斯托克的空间是康宇宙，康宇宙主动与主宇宙相连，干扰了主宇宙产生交集，主宇宙的布克去康宇宙干掉了康姆斯托克，对其他宇宙应该没有影响才对，他完全可以带着伊丽莎白回到主宇宙生活，而且伊丽莎白本就是主宇宙的人，康姆斯托克已经死了，就算把布克带到了康宇宙接受洗礼之前溺死应该是对其他宇宙造成不了影响的啊，怎么会因为在这个宇宙的作为能影响其他宇宙的事物呢？
  初次之外这个游戏不愧第九艺术的名头，强烈推荐。
сюжет пиздатый, бродить не очень интересно

This game was ahead of its time. The graphics and vision of this game maybe have been a few years ahead of its time. But the beautiful story telling and what makes you fall in love with the BIoshock  is afterall the story.

Would love to see a rematstered version of this some day in the future. It's just too beaufiful.

Bu oyunun neresinden başlamalı anlatmaya gerçekten bilmiyorum. Hayatımda oynadığım en muhteşem hikayeli oyunlar arasında ilk 3 e girer diye düşünüyorum, hele hele DLC'si. Bu hikaye mutlaka dizi , film birşey yapılmalı. Oyunun atmosferi ilk iki oyundan farklı, kasvetli ve karanlık değil, ancak her dakikası sizi içine çekiyor. Savaş mekanikleri geliştirilmiş ve daha realist bir hal almış. Silahlar, vigor'lar, oyundaki haritalar, mekanlar ve tekrar söylüyorum, hikaye, enfes ötesi. Bu oyunun mutlaka oynayın, oynatın. Gerçek bir başyapıt.

sadly not infinite

Combat feels fun and fast even though movement feels clunky and a confusion of whether infinite wanted to be a fast paced shooter or a cover shooter,difficulty is non existent as i played on hard mode and never once had a tough time,very little incentives to upgrade weapons/vigor,options menu severely lacking (bloom/lens flare/hold to aim/aim assist) all cant be turned on or off,story is really good as u build a relationship with Elizabeth and both of you grow and develop as characters and grow to care for Elizabeth but the ending in my opinion is very abrupt and after the post credit scene, its more of a "oh ok" moment. Overall still a fun game and holds up even to todays standards with excellent story and is definitely worth buying with the season pass.

神作！
第一款让我玩双周目的线性剧情的射击游戏。
游戏本体流程7个小时左右，比较不错（看之前的游戏新闻说好像当时开发时有点紧所以缩水了一些细节和部分剧情）。
游戏射击手感上比较一般，中等吧（经常玩各种射击游戏，所以玩的时候在射击体验上感觉比较明显）。
游戏的剧情以及人物塑造方面可谓神作。
游戏美工方面也是非常厉害。用媒体的官方词来评价：美轮美奂的画面表现！

================================================================================================

Одна из самых великолепных и шедевральных синг игр,которые мне только приходилось попробывать.
Тут есть всё,отличный сюжет,история,интересные персонажи,диалоги,стрельба,механика и тд.

Я помню те времена,когда эта играла была хайповой и нам показывали кучу крутых роликов.
И ОНИ БЫЛИ ПРАВДИВЫМИ!

Абсолютно всё было добавлено в игру.
Всё то,что мы видели в ролике,было добавлено в игру.

Элизабет и Букер(вроде,пишу обзор просто из памяти своей) интересны.
Сам мир Bioshock  по себе захватывающий и интересный.
Сама идея была огонь.Придумать летающий город на квантовом двигателе.

Сейчас игра устарела конечно,но тогда это был шедевр.
Таких игр сейчас мало делают.

Я прошёл игру раз 15 уж точно на пиратской версии.
Тут прошел на самом сложном уровне и теперь меня просто тошнит уже от неё.

Но сама вселенная Bioshock  только улучшилась с этой частью.
Они рискнули и сделали не подводный мир,как это было в 1 и 2 части.
А совсем противоположный мир!


Игра годнота

P.s.Обзор хрень полная,так как оказалось,что далеко не всё было добавлено в игру.
Я не разобрал многие детали с инсайдерской информации.

Но я потрясён,что даже не смотря на такое ограничение они смогли выпустить хорошую игру.
Респект.

단순히 미래로만 전개되는 시리즈물이 아니라 전작의 이야기들이 모두 이어지는 좋은 마무리였습니다. 
다시 해도 재밌고 생각할 거리가 많아지는 작품이네요.  
이제 7년이 넘어가는 게임인데도 그래픽이 환상적인 게임이에요. 요새 고퀄리티,라고 하면 실사에 가까운 그래픽이 많은데. 바이오쇼크는 인물과 배경 모두 이 게임에 어울리도록 만들어진 거 같아 좋아합니다.

그리고 전작에서 느꼈던 불편함도 많이 사라졌어요. 특히 맵디자인에서요. 파트너인 엘리자베스의 전투 역할도 좋았고요. (단순 보조가 아닌 그녀만 가능한 능력도 포함해서요)

바다의 무덤 DLC 2부까지가 *바이오쇼크 시리즈*의 마무리라고 생각합니다. 여기까지 하고 바쇽1을 다시 하면 감회가 새로울 거 같네요. 또 해야지.

Despite being a long-time fan of Bioshock, Bioshock Infinite completely blindsided me. I'm almost ashamed that I slept on it for so long. When it first released, friends were putting it down and I found myself turning away from the game. Eventually I just... forgot about it. Didn't get around to it. I think now, that people were judging it based on the rose-tinted glasses they were viewing Bioshock 1 through.

While I do prefer Rapture to Columbia, it is ONLY personal preference to be underwater as opposed to being above the clouds. I felt that Columbia's weird alternative history world-building was so much stronger than Rapture's. Rapture did have the allure of mystery, but Columbia feels much more fully realized. And it is REALLY something to behold. 

However, I didn't care too much for Infinite's combat. I much prefer splicers and big daddies to mechanized patriots and militia/soldiers. Columbia's heavily defended world (full of innocent civilians needing protecting - from you, apparently) means you have to fight waves upon waves of enemies, making the game's combat feel like an absolute never-ending slew of bullets. You're able to swap out many different types of firearms to give yourself some variety, and Elizabeth has an interesting skill that spices things up. And still, for me, this was far less interesting than Rapture's smattering of weird muttering crackheads who sneak up behind you and try to whack you in the head with a wrench. Columbia has no panicked moments of "ah frick I'm gonna die," not even when a Handyman shows up.

Bioshock Infinite's greatest strength, I believe, lies in its characters and story. Elizabeth is absolutely charming and Troy Baker's voice acting keeps Booker from feeling like an otherwise bland/generic protagonist. What a duo. It was a delight getting to spend the game with Elizabeth, rather than being alone. She's very useful, too! 

And the story... lordt. It is difficult to speak much about the subject without giving spoilers. I will say that reaching the end of the game and realizing why the game was called Bioshock Infinite... blew my f*cking socks off. The sense of awe and wonder during some of the final cutscenes. Ah. It's an idea that is not necessarily original but still managed to be somewhat of a tour de force in execution.

The noir-esque Burial at Sea DLC expands on the ending a bit and is 100% worth checking out, especially if you want to pop back into Rapture for a little while. However, the full DLC is $30 and not really long enough to warrant the price point, so grab the season pass on sale.

我主要是来分享一下我是怎么成功安装启动游戏时强制安装的插件的，我先按网上说的语言设置成英文，然后改兼容性（游戏安装目录-Binaries-Win32-右击游戏-属性-兼容性Win7），完了用WiFi下不了（移动的），手机热点下不了（还是移动），开了加速器甚至翻了墙，还是下不了，最后是室友开的联通网的热点，成功了...我19年刚下游戏的时候没这问题，玩了几小时之后因为某种原因卸了，最近想玩了才下的，一搜发现不止我一个人有这问题，希望能帮一些人解决问题，很优秀的游戏，买了玩不了属实可惜。

First and the best thing about this game... [b]ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL WORLD DESIGN![/b]
The floating city of Columbia is a perfect steampunk utopian city. My first 1-2hrs in the game were just exploring, appreciating, each and every corner of this beautiful city. MAGNIFICENT! Reaaallly made me wanna go and live there!

Not happy with how you can only use 2 guns at a time. Even if you stick with your fav weapons, the ammo dropped by enemies are random...so you eventually *have to* switch to/pick up some other weapon. And i have no idea why the sniper rifle was scattered SO MUCH throughout the world. I didnt want to use it, but only that weapon was available in plenty. Using the guns is very satisfying....great animation+sound mixing! 

Your plasmids from previous BioShock games is now Vigors...and just like previous games, i used 2-3 vigors only. Never found others useful. So it all depends on your playstyle. 

There are 'Gears' to wear which give you some stat bonuses and tbh, most of them are worthless.

Audiologs are now Voxophones...I have no idea why they removed the subtitles when listening to them!? You have to go to options to 'read' your Voxophones....and the font is SO SMALL! Pathetic.

Good characters, good story. Great voice acting!
There are some things which i still dont understand why they were there (and which i cant say here because of spoilers).

This game has better twist in the end than the first two games combined.

玩完之后又看了剧情解析，太震惊了，剧情和标题的“无限”完美契合。只能说这部游戏，真的牛批

还有伊丽莎白永远的神，这才是神队友

The story is excellent and absolutely gripping from start to finish. The game-play is satisfying, especially if you like gun-play, but may be a bit easy for veterans even on the hardest difficulty. I will likely only play this once or twice but the first run through was brilliant.

Gameplay: 10/10
Historia: 10/10
Música: 10/10
Rendimiento:10/10

Posiblemente el mejor juego que haya probado.

If you want your head to hurt with the utmost gratification mindfuckery then play this game and its DLC, you will sit in your room or where ever you reside and just sit in utter darkest thinking of all the moments and choices you've ever made in this franchises games and go "huh, just huh.... WTF". Sadly, there's still no way to wipe your memory and experience the mindfuck all over again.
Really good game, spot on story with unexpected twists. Great addition to the BioShock series, wish I could have played it sooner.
스팀에서 처음으로 끝까지 해본 게임. 엘리자베스는 머리 자른 단발이 제일 이쁘다.
